Title: I’m Scared to Approach My Boss With Business Ideas
Description:
Today we’ll hear about: 

  • A project manager who has ideas to save his boss money but is hesitant to share them 
  • A husband wondering if selling a business will reduce stress at home 
  • Dave Ramsey sharing how the Havdalah service has impacted his view on generosity 
  • A business owner unsure of how to prioritize his debt
